sense.def:
To spend money
pomeni uporabiti denar, da z njim plačamo stvari.

seg.quote: We always spend a lot of money on parties.
The buildings need a lot of money spent on them.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
ADJUNCT
or
-ING

sense.def:
To spend a period of time somewhere
pomeni biti nekje za določeno obdobje.
To spend a period of time doing something
pomeni delati nekaj določen čas.

seg.quote: He spent most of his time in the library.
She woke early, meaning to spend all day writing.
